author: ajsutton
content:
It depends how many deposits are ahead of you.  There are at most 4 validators activated per epoch so about 900 per day.  There were 10,000 deposits sent about a week ago and it's been working through that list since.  They'll take another 2.5 days or so to go through, then it starts on whatever deposits have come through in the mean time.
There's another batch of 5,000 deposits that have been sent today as well but haven't been added to the beacon chain yet (due to the follow distance).

author: ajsutton
content: The client teams are trying to significantly increase the number of validators on prater so that it isn't too much smaller than mainnet and remains a useful testing ground, but that means pushing quite a lot of deposits.
